alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 12 at 6:54PM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From this evening to Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will rise to 4.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall to flood stage tomorrow evening. It will rise to 4.1 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 MSG unknown 4.0 4.1 3.9 &&
